text:
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 CONNECTICUT AVENUE
WASHINGTON 36, D. C.
WILLIAM G. HARLEY
PRESIDENT
April 30, 19 64
Miss Marion E. Corwell
Associate Director of School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Miss Corwell:
A quick note re Public Relations Committee replacements.
The following people are due to rotate off this year:
Gertrude Broderick, USOE
Lillian Brown, Geo. Wash. U.
Frances Butler, AAUW
We are anxious to complete committee assignments so that we can
send out a printed list of same to the membership. Therefore, I
will forego frugality and call Leontine Keane - and anyone else you
suggest.
Thank you for your willing cooperation and Cheers-
( ;on
Secretary to Mr. Harley
P. S.
Just read my last letter to you - what about Dona Lee Davenport? Yea
or Nay?
